website_summaries.verdict: A well-stocked set with an impressive collection of tools – with proper care, you will have nearly everything you need to grow, nurture, and maintain your bonsai plants.
pros: A comprehensive array of tools for most aspects of the art of bonsai, from preparing soil to shaping and trimming plants
Set includes a spacious nylon storage case
cons: Pricey, but you get a lot for your money
A few complaints of tools breaking or bending
Tools may develop rust, but keeping them oiled should prevent this

customer_reviews.title: It goes above my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to let everyone know that I received my 14 piece bonsai tool set today and I am very impressed! It goes way above my expectations because of some of the negative reviews. Everything is on perfect condition and I received each and everything that was shown in the description. The only reason I didn't show the rolls of wire that comes with it is because I wanted a picture of all the tools to show how they came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Athey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Within the first 5 minutes of using, one of the tools broke while trimming and cutting a small branch. The quality is terrible. I would have returned it but, I bought it for x-mas and was way past 30 days of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Pineyro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you know what you’re doing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed there’s a lot of complaints about this product when I received it I was very happy these are carbon steel if you cannot sharpen Or keep Carbon steel in line you should not buy a gun or knife these are excellent tools especially for the price Spend your money on the stainless steel if you don’t want to take care of your tools as far as I am Concerned these are more than Enough. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Guest

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the lower rating reviews I received my tools in great shape not rusted or misaligned if you have basic skills with this kind of tool you know the proper way to cate for the tools rust cleans off easy and keep them oiled and in a case. This tool kit is really a good value for the money. I have been playing with bonsais for a long time this kit is really good for most bonsai enthusiasts. Recommend this buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Indaskys

customer_reviews.title: Great value, just about everything you need to get started!
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy duty tools, although they are nimble enough to work around my very young bonsai (3-7 years old). The case is great and sturdy and doesn't look too industrial in my minimalist bonsai shelf. I keep alcohol cleaning pads in the case to use before and after. The only real issue is the hand saw is GIGANTIC! I don't have any branches large enough to warrant that beast, but I think I will put it to use outside on my larger plants.
customer_reviews.author: HanSolo

customer_reviews.title: Great bonsai tool set for this relative newbie.
customer_reviews.text: This little kit contained the basic bonsai tools. Up to this point I had been using my regular side cutters, scissors and pliers. No, they are the highest professional quality, but for the price, I'm pretty happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Highly Engrossed

customer_reviews.title: Good Disposable tool kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this Item to leave at work ( mainly because I do not want to bring my good tools back and forth ), I got what I paid for, for sure. I would not be upset if it were stolen. However, this would be a great set for a beginner, to learn with, no loss if they decide to quit the hobby, but for the enthusiast, I would not recommend this kit, out of the box I had to clean up the cutting edge of the Scissors, and noticed a slight overlap in the jaws of the branch splitter. Not a terrible set, all in all, but do not expect the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Awful.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Nice sized products but the hinges are awful. The tools did not fit together properly and you could not even take them apart to sharpen them or adjust them. These are concerns you should not have with brand new tools! Sure, they're inexpensive... But there is good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: All the Bonsai tools you need in one handy package.
customer_reviews.text: I've now used them for several months and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dean

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy tools
customer_reviews.text: The tool set came in a timely manner. However, one of the tools (the bud shear) became warped after 4 days of use and no longer functions appropriately - it barely can cut.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners, not for quality bonsai growers
customer_reviews.text: Good beginners tool set for bonsai care. Quality of steel is average and required significant time to adequately sharpen. If you have money, like anything else, quality is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon M.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft metal
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of tools be careful what you cut if the branches are a little on the thicker side they've been very easily I've already had two rework 4 tools so they will cut again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have given it 5 stars if it had a root rake instead of a root hook
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit of tools in a very nice pouch. All the essentials for bonsai care except you may want to use a dinner fork as a root rake because hook does not work as efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Roisum, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: I Love mubset so if I were you I would buy it. This is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set and all you need. Cool case!!I've it and use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: User XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Good tool set
customer_reviews.text: Good tool set, sharp cutting edges. Only thing that could have been better is a more precise milling at the junction. Several were harder to open then usual. Maybe they will loosen up a little with use.
customer_reviews.author: jamesbtex

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times, as I don’t have many bonsai yet! I will say, they are very sharp and very good solid quality, or so it seems. I’ll update once I have more to use the tools on, but for now definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners. Dont expect even near perfect tools.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the kit. Wire cutter tip is broken. The tool kit have been used for sure. And most of the tools are rusted. Many of them dont align well to cut appropriately. I can say I will use it in the beginning but the broken corner of the tip of wire cutter makes it not useful and I am considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Tools came in perfect condition and actually came in early. Did not see any rust or chipped pieces like I was worried about due to other reviews. All in all very happy and can't wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: work like they should
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the chance to use all of the tools yet. The ones I have, work like they should. Nice feel to them and in a good case.
customer_reviews.author: Toadly

customer_reviews.title: A very nice set. I enjoyed using these tools
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set. I enjoyed using these tools. Brand new and no rust. Quality instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Sharp bits on the ends of handles, blades with the bits not ground all the way, uneven plyer tips, unanodized wire, high resistance on moving parts, and a knob cutter with an overbite. Amazon did take my return though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son who is new to caring for a bonsai tree , he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CrisAngel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good kit but I wish they had sharpened the cutters and sissies better.
customer_reviews.author: Bobc

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality metal
customer_reviews.text: The pruning shears broke on first use and the trimmers and dull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Extremely heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Extremely heavy duty. I have used it many times.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Not a bad little kit for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely pacckage and was exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Bill Y.

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai tools
customer_reviews.text: Multiple tuols to accomplish any task with your bonsai plus wire.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of steel processing is not perfect, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginners Choice!
customer_reviews.text: A very economical yet complete way to start your bonsai hobby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tools a couple could have been a little better sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Kile Cothren

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I wasn't expecting top quality but I'm satisfied. I think they are great for someone like me who is just starting to learn and work with bonsai. Nothing fancy but they work as they should. I wish they include or introduce a new set that brings a wire cutter but I'm going to get that later, I'm using the branch cutter for that purpose for now since I just needed to clip 2 wires.
customer_reviews.author: Po345

customer_reviews.title: Great tools! I use the small scissor and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tools! I use the small scissor and the root teaser the most useful.
customer_reviews.author: indayzf

customer_reviews.title: The tools look very sturdy and we'll made
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the tools yet being located in snowy winter weather. The tools look very sturdy and we'll made. Nothing loose. The tools were oiled to prevent the from rusting. The tool holder case is well stocked and we'll made. Zipper is strong and case is Well made to protect these tools.
customer_reviews.author: G. Anctil

customer_reviews.title: Broom is missing in the package
customer_reviews.text: Product came in good condition all are looking great but the broom is missing in the package. Could you please ship it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal

customer_reviews.title: these tools are crap. They are stiff and not sharp
customer_reviews.text: Even for a starter kit, these tools are crap. They are stiff and not sharp. The will damage the plant and cause slow growth. I guess if you reall need all the tools ard have no money they are good. but none of them are realy sharp like you need. and they have light rust on them. just save yourself the efort and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are some good quality tools from China
customer_reviews.text: There are some good quality tools from China, but there's also poor quality tools. If you buy via mail order it's impossible to tell quality from a photo. Voilamart are poor quality the burrs were not even polished off. A burr is a raised edge or small piece of material remaining attached to a workpiece after a modification process. It is usually an unwanted piece of material and is removed with a deburring tool in a process called 'deburring'.
customer_reviews.author: David Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best option for the price! Oil each tool and you’ll love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Best option for the price. They’ve hand made these tools so they aren’t without imperfections but that is to be expected when something is hand made. Really sharp and heavy - Each tool is VERY stiff upon arrival so OIL EACH TOOL AT ALL JOINTS and keep them clean - this set will last you a long long time. I was extremely hesitant as I’d purchased a couple of sets before that were crap. Good zip case. I didn’t care for the wire - thought that could have been better but all in all for the price I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: V

product_meta.title: Voilamart 14 Piece Bonsai Tools Kit with Case, Carbon Steel Scissor Cutter Shear Set Garden Plant Tools
product_meta.description:
Size:14PCS KitThis bonsai tool kit made of carbon steel can be applied in the whole process of nurturing your favourite bonsai.
With this bonsai care kit, you can work and loose the bonsai soil, also can cut the bonsai root and large branches, make a precision pruning or trimming of leaves and buds as well.
Choosing this bonsai tool kit, not only can you bend bonsai branches and eliminate debris safely but also make a clean flush cut without damage, even can get assist when bonsai being grafted.
Great gift for bonsai grower, starters or enthusiast. Enjoy bonsai with this awesome kit! You will find it a lot of fun!

Notice:
(1) Inspect your tools after each use, removing dirt and debris.
(2) Note any dull blades or nicks for the grit from potting soil easily dull or damage the blade, you must be carefully when use scissors for its sharp blade.
(3) Never use force when working with bonsai tools. Forcing blades that are too narrow or small will damage the branch as well as the tool.
(4) Soak root hooks in warm soapy and dry thoroughly after each use.
(5) Treat newly cleaned tools to an oiling with a good rust prevention product. (Oil is not included in this kit)

Package Includes:
1 x 11cm Leaf Trimmer
1 x 21cm Long Handle Shear(Bud Shear)
1 x 19.5cm Large Cutting Scissors
1 x 18cm Medium Cutting Scissors
1 x 20cm Concave Cutter
1 x 21cm Knob Cutter
1 x 20cm Traditional Wire Cutter
1 x 18cm Root Cutter
1 x 23cm Jin Pliers
1 x 27cm Trunk Splitter
1 x 23cm Root Hook
1 x 22cm Rake with Spatula
1 x Branch Bender(11x9cm)
1 x 16cm Hemp Broom
5 x Aluminium Rolls of Training Wire
1 x All-In-One Nylon Tool Case
feature_bullets: Complete 14PCS Bonsai Tools Set - including Leaf Trimmer, Bud Shear, Cutting Scissor, Concave Cutter, Knob Cutter, Wire Cutter, Root Cutter, Jin Pliers, Trunk Splitter, Root Hook, Rake with Spatula, Branch Bender, Hemp Broom, Wire, Nylon Tool Case
Quality Made Construction - Made of carbon steel fully inspected, ther are sharp, durable and very handy, suitable for beginners or professionals
Tool used for leaves trimming, loose the bonsai soil, precise and refined pruning the root, branches, twigs and bud etc.
Care Instruction - Remove dirt and debris with a dry cloth and lightly oil after every use.
A beautiful and practical tool set, comes with nylon case for convenience, an ideal gift for bonsai lover.
